name: M Rayquaza EX
author: 5ban Graphics

ancient_trait.name: Δ  Evolution
ancient_trait.effect: You may play this card from your hand to evolve a Pokémon during your first turn or the turn you play that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Emerald Break
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon.

rule_box:
When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
